about_the_game:
Finally the soundtrack to your student experience at Two Point Campus is here to help you relive all the highs, lows and awkward dancing in the corner.

This carefully curated mixtape features a heady blend of hits you might recognize from local campus bands to celebrity chefs turned DJs, and even Two Point County’s most famous musical maestro herself, Ms Jasmine Odyssey.

So whether you prefer the funky and slightly metallic sounds of the Boogie Knights, or the magical melancholy of Alchemical Friendship, there’s something here for everyone.
detailed_description:
Finally the soundtrack to your student experience at Two Point Campus is here to help you relive all the highs, lows and awkward dancing in the corner.

This carefully curated mixtape features a heady blend of hits you might recognize from local campus bands to celebrity chefs turned DJs, and even Two Point County’s most famous musical maestro herself, Ms Jasmine Odyssey.

So whether you prefer the funky and slightly metallic sounds of the Boogie Knights, or the magical melancholy of Alchemical Friendship, there’s something here for everyone.
